features.name: Authentication
features.description: User login/logout with JWT tokens and role-based access control (admin, gerente, supervisor_finca, contador_rrhh, bodeguero)

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard showing production metrics, weekly stats, alerts, and quick access cards

features.name: Enfundes Management
features.description: CRUD operations for banana bagging records including week, year, ribbon color, and fallen plants

features.name: Cosechas Management
features.description: CRUD operations for harvest records including bunches, boxes produced, ratio, and waste percentage

features.name: Productivity Heatmap
features.description: Visual heatmap showing production by lot (A-E) for each farm with color intensity based on output

features.name: Ribbon Recovery
features.description: Track ribbon usage and recovery rates across farms and weeks

features.name: Inventory Management
features.description: CRUD for supplies/inputs with stock levels, categories, suppliers, and expiration dates

features.name: Inventory Alerts
features.description: Display alerts when stock_actual < stock_minimo for any supply item

features.name: Inventory Movements
features.description: Track entry/exit movements of supplies with quantity, type, and date

features.name: Employee Management
features.description: CRUD for employees with farm assignment, position, and contact information

features.name: Payroll (Roles de Pago)
features.description: Generate and manage payroll records with salary calculations, bonuses, and deductions

features.name: Loans Management
features.description: Track employee loans with installments and pending balances

features.name: Reports Dashboard
features.description: Interactive charts showing production by farm, trends, and farm comparisons with temporal filters

features.name: Production Reports
features.description: Detailed production reports with weekly/monthly data and PDF export

features.name: Predictive Analytics
features.description: AI-powered projections for production, prices, and risks with configurable period and confidence levels

features.name: Farm Management
features.description: CRUD for farms with geolocation, lots, and responsible person

features.name: Interactive Map
features.description: Leaflet-based map showing farm locations and lot boundaries

features.name: User Management
features.description: Admin interface for managing system users and their roles

features.name: App Context
features.description: Global state management using React Context for all data entities and API operations

features.name: API Client
features.description: HTTP client for communicating with Django REST backend with JWT authentication

features.name: Layout Components
features.description: App shell with sidebar navigation, header, and responsive design
